trademark-search-title: Free online search for trademarks in Kazakhstan, Russia and Uzbekistan
choose-country: Choose the country where you want to search and register Trademarks:
modal-help-title: What is this site and how to use it
modal-help-content:
• Type the first 2-3 letters of your trademark (designation). This will help you get more results on the right trademark.
  • Select the desired class (s) of ICGS. TM search will be carried out in all or in selected classes of the International Classification of Goods and Services (IKTU).
  • Click the "Search" button. We will look for your TM in the national register of trademarks (among registered trademarks and trademarks filed for registration).
modal-callback-subtitle: Leave your phone number and we will call you back
error-page-title:
Oh, there was an error!
Try again and you will succeed.
trademark-classes: Classes of ICGS and a list of goods and / or services:
